00020 #ifndef SdReader_h
00021 #define SdReader_h
00022 #include "SdInfo.h"
00024 #define SD_CARD_INFO_SUPPORT 1
00025 //
00026 // SD card commands
00028 #define CMD0     0X00      
00029 
00030 #define CMD8     0X08
00031 
00032 #define CMD9     0X09      
00033 
00034 #define CMD10    0X0A     
00035 
00036 #define CMD17    0X11
00037 
00038 #define CMD55    0X37      
00039 
00040 #define CMD58    0X3A
00041 
00043 #define ACMD41   0X29      
00044 //
00045 // SD card errors
00047 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_CMD0  0X1
00048 
00049 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_CMD8  0X2
00050 
00051 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_CMD17 0X3
00052 
00053 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_CMD24 0X4
00054 
00055 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_CMD58 0X5
00056 
00057 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_ACMD41 0X6
00058 
00059 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_BAD_CSD 0X7
00060 
00061 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_READ_REG 0X8
00062 
00063 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_WRITE_TIMEOUT 0X9
00064 
00065 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_WRITE_BLOCK_ZERO 0XA
00067 
00068 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_READ 0X10
00069 
00070 #define SD_CARD_ERROR_WRITE 0X20
00071 //
00072 // card types
00074 #define SD_CARD_TYPE_SD1 1
00075 
00076 #define SD_CARD_TYPE_SD2 2
00077 
00078 #define SD_CARD_TYPE_SDHC 3
00079 
00086 class SdReader  {
00087   uint32_t block_;
00088   uint8_t errorCode_;
00089   uint8_t errorData_;
00090   uint8_t inBlock_;
00091   uint16_t offset_;
00092   uint8_t partialBlockRead_;
00093   uint8_t response_;
00094   uint8_t type_;
00095   uint8_t cardCommand(uint8_t cmd, uint32_t arg, uint8_t crc = 0XFF);
00096   void error(uint8_t code){errorCode_ = code;}
00097   void error(uint8_t code, uint8_t data) {errorCode_ = code; errorData_ = data;}
00098   uint8_t readRegister(uint8_t cmd, uint8_t *dst);
00099   void type(uint8_t value) {type_ = value;}
00100   uint8_t waitStartBlock(void);
00101 public:
00103   SdReader(void) :  errorCode_(0), inBlock_(0), partialBlockRead_(0), type_(0) {};
00104   uint32_t cardSize(void);
00106   uint8_t errorCode(void) {return errorCode_;}
00108   uint8_t errorData(void) {return errorData_;}
00109   uint8_t init(uint8_t slow = 0);
00121   void partialBlockRead(uint8_t value) {readEnd(); partialBlockRead_ = value;}
00131   uint8_t readBlock(uint32_t block, uint8_t *dst) {
00132     return readData(block, 0, dst, 512);}
00133   uint8_t readData(uint32_t block, uint16_t offset, uint8_t *dst, uint16_t count);
00138   uint8_t readCID(cid_t &cid) {return readRegister(CMD10, (uint8_t *)&cid);}
00142   uint8_t readCSD(csd_t &csd) {return readRegister(CMD9, (uint8_t *)&csd);}
00143   void readEnd(void);
00145   uint8_t type() {return type_;}
00146 };
00147 #endif //SdReader_h
